name: 陳偉堯
objective: 本課程作為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授計算機概念及架構、數字系統與編碼系統、電腦指令、程式概念及Fortran高階程式語言，內容包括電腦歷史、語言發展、電腦運作概念、整數和實數的二進位表達方法、指定敘述、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出輸入敘述、陣列處理、檔案處理、及子程式等課題。
schedule:
Week 01: Chapter 1 binary and decimal numbers
Week 02: Chapter 2 basic elements of Fortran (variables)
Week 03: Chapter 2 basic elements of Fortran (statements)
Week 04: Chapter 3 branching structures (if/then/else)
Week 05: Chapter 3 branching structures (switch)
Week 06: Exam #1
Week 07: Chapter 4 loops (do loop)
Week 08: Chapter 4 loops (while loop)
Week 09: Chapter 5 format
Week 10: Chapter 5 file input
Week 11: Chapter 5 file output
Week 12: Exam #2
Week 13: Chapter 6 arrays
Week 14: Chapter 6 arrays
Week 15: Chapter 7 procedures
Week 16: Chapter 7 procedures
Week 17: Review
Week 18: Final exam (Exam #3)
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance 40%
Exam #1 20% (programming test)
Exam #2 20% (programming test)
Exam #3 20% (programming test)
materials: Chapman, S. J. (2008). Fortran 95/2003 for Scientists and Engineers, Third edition, McGraw Hill, 974 pages, ISBN: 978-0-07-128578-0
